_description: Phrases describing three evils, in a sermon — three monorhyming lines

BLHar7322.Transcription: A fals byhetygA lyeres anansyngA bitynde fondig
BLHar7322.Note: Set out to right of lines of Latin of similar content, “promissio fallax, promocio mendax, prolacio Mordax.”

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
